metadata.title: CVE-2020-36516 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16.11. The mixed IPIDassignment method with the hash-based IPID assignment policy allows anoff-path attacker to inject data into a victim's TCP session or terminatethat session.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36516` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-109-generic - 5.4.0-109.123
linux-image-5.4.0-109-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-109.123
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-109-generic - 5.4.0-109.123
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-109-lowlatency - 5.4.0-109.123
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1062-kvm - 5.4.0-1062.65
No subscription required
